Comedies.Title: Life Is Beautiful
Comedies.Synopsis: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Comedies.Title: Back to the Future
Comedies.Synopsis: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Comedies.Title: The Intouchables
Comedies.Synopsis: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Comedies.Title: Amélie
Comedies.Synopsis: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Comedies.Title: 3 Idiots
Comedies.Synopsis: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently.

Comedies.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Comedies.Synopsis: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Comedies.Title: Toy Story
Comedies.Synopsis: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Comedies.Title: Snatch
Comedies.Synopsis: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Comedies.Title: Groundhog Day
Comedies.Synopsis: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

Comedies.Title: Toy Story 3
Comedies.Synopsis: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Comedies.Title: The Big Lebowski
Comedies.Synopsis: Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a soiled rug and finds himself in the middle of a kidnapping.

Comedies.Title: Home Alone
Comedies.Synopsis: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

Comedies.Title: Finding Nemo
Comedies.Synopsis: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Comedies.Title: Up
Comedies.Synopsis: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Comedies.Title: Monsters, Inc.
Comedies.Synopsis: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.
Comedies.Director: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich

Comedies.Title: The Hangover
Comedies.Synopsis: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

Comedies.Title: Zootopia
Comedies.Synopsis: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
Comedies.Director: Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Jared Bush

Comedies.Title: Ratatouille
Comedies.Synopsis: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

Comedies.Title: How to Train Your Dragon
Comedies.Synopsis: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

Comedies.Title: Kung Fu Panda
Comedies.Synopsis: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an arbitrary panda.

Comedies.Title: The Incredibles
Comedies.Synopsis: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Comedies.Title: Superbad
Comedies.Synopsis: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Comedies.Title: Shrek
Comedies.Synopsis: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

Comedies.Title: Inside Out
Comedies.Synopsis: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Comedies.Title: In Bruges
Comedies.Synopsis: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

Comedies.Title: WALL·E
Comedies.Synopsis: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Comedies.Title: Coco
Comedies.Synopsis: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Comedies.Title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Comedies.Synopsis: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

Comedies.Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Comedies.Synopsis: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

Comedies.Title: The Princess Bride
Comedies.Synopsis: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

Comedies.Title: Some Like It Hot
Comedies.Synopsis: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Comedies.Title: The Apartment
Comedies.Synopsis: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications ensue when he falls for one of their girlfriends.

Comedies.Title: Dr. Strangelove
Comedies.Synopsis: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Comedies.Title: Rushmore
Comedies.Synopsis: The extracurricular king of a prep school and a rich, melancholy industrialist become rivals for the affections of a first-grade teacher.

Comedies.Title: The Royal Tenenbaums
Comedies.Synopsis: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

Comedies.Title: Napoleon Dynamite
Comedies.Synopsis: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, all while dealing with his dysfunctional family.

Comedies.Title: Bridesmaids
Comedies.Synopsis: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an idealistic woman.

Comedies.Title: Shaun of the Dead
Comedies.Synopsis: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Comedies.Title: Hot Fuzz
Comedies.Synopsis: A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town, where he partners with a witless local and uncovers a sinister conspiracy.

Comedies.Title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
Comedies.Synopsis: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

Comedies.Title: The Breakfast Club
Comedies.Synopsis: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

Comedies.Title: Dumb and Dumber
Comedies.Synopsis: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Comedies.Title: The Mask
Comedies.Synopsis: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

Comedies.Title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
Comedies.Synopsis: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

Comedies.Title: Liar Liar
Comedies.Synopsis: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after the lawyer misses his son's birthday party.

Comedies.Title: Bruce Almighty
Comedies.Synopsis: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

Comedies.Title: Ghostbusters
Comedies.Synopsis: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

Comedies.Title: Caddyshack
Comedies.Synopsis: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a slob and his buddies as well as a gopher wreaking havoc on the course.

Comedies.Title: Trading Places
Comedies.Synopsis: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

Comedies.Title: Coming to America
Comedies.Synopsis: An African prince goes to Queens, New York City to find a wife whom he can respect for her intelligence and strong will.

Comedies.Title: Beverly Hills Cop
Comedies.Synopsis: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Comedies.Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Comedies.Synopsis: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Comedies.Title: Good Morning, Vietnam
Comedies.Synopsis: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

Comedies.Title: Aladdin
Comedies.Synopsis: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Comedies.Title: Airplane!
Comedies.Synopsis: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.
Comedies.Director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

Comedies.Title: The Naked Gun
Comedies.Synopsis: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

Comedies.Title: Blazing Saddles
Comedies.Synopsis: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his biggest headache.

Comedies.Title: Young Frankenstein
Comedies.Synopsis: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania.

Comedies.Title: Spaceballs
Comedies.Synopsis: A star-Loss parody. Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own.

Comedies.Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Comedies.Synopsis: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane.

Comedies.Title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Comedies.Synopsis: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

Comedies.Title: Jojo Rabbit
Comedies.Synopsis: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose imaginary friend is the country's dictator must confront his nationalism when he meets a Jewish girl.

Comedies.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Comedies.Synopsis: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world.

Comedies.Title: Step Brothers
Comedies.Synopsis: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

Comedies.Title: Anchorman
Comedies.Synopsis: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change when a woman joins the team.

Comedies.Title: Talladega Nights
Comedies.Synopsis: Number-one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the racing world with the help of his best friend and teammate.

Comedies.Title: Elf
Comedies.Synopsis: Raised as an oversized elf, Buddy travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, a cynical businessman.

Comedies.Title: Blades of Glory
Comedies.Synopsis: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and banned from men's single competition. Their only option? Team up as the first male-male figure skating pair.

Comedies.Title: Zoolander
Comedies.Synopsis: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

Comedies.Title: Tropic Thunder
Comedies.Synopsis: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

Comedies.Title: Dodgeball
Comedies.Synopsis: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their beloved local gym from being purchased by a corporate fitness chain.

Comedies.Title: Meet the Parents
Comedies.Synopsis: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

Comedies.Title: There's Something About Mary
Comedies.Synopsis: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a total disaster.

Comedies.Title: Austin Powers
Comedies.Synopsis: A world-famous spy from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to oppose his nemesis Dr. Evil.

Comedies.Title: Wayne's World
Comedies.Synopsis: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show and win the heart of a rock singer.

Comedies.Title: Borat
Comedies.Synopsis: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world.

Comedies.Title: Team America: World Police
Comedies.Synopsis: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police.

Comedies.Title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
Comedies.Synopsis: When Canadian celebrities Terrance and Phillip release a feature-film containing profane language, the South Park children become foul-mouthed, which upsets their parents.

Comedies.Title: This Is Spinal Tap
Comedies.Synopsis: Marty DiBergi wants to make a rockumentary about one of England's loudest bands, Spinal Tap. The only problem is that it's nearly impossible to take anyone in this band seriously.

Comedies.Title: Best in Show
Comedies.Synopsis: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

Comedies.Title: Office Space
Comedies.Synopsis: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

Comedies.Title: Idiocracy
Comedies.Synopsis: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of 'average American', is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program.

Comedies.Title: Galaxy Quest
Comedies.Synopsis: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show must play their roles as the real thing when an idealistic alien race needs their help.

Comedies.Title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
Comedies.Synopsis: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

Comedies.Title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
Comedies.Synopsis: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never 'done the deed' only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

Comedies.Title: Knocked Up
Comedies.Synopsis: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

Comedies.Title: This Is the End
Comedies.Synopsis: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group must face the consequences of their immoral past lives.

Comedies.Title: Pineapple Express
Comedies.Synopsis: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor.

Comedies.Title: 21 Jump Street
Comedies.Synopsis: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

Comedies.Title: The LEGO Movie
Comedies.Synopsis: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

Comedies.Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Comedies.Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
Comedies.Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman

Comedies.Title: Deadpool
Comedies.Synopsis: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Comedies.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Comedies.Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Comedies.Title: Men in Black
Comedies.Synopsis: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

Comedies.Title: Bad Boys
Comedies.Synopsis: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

Comedies.Title: Rush Hour
Comedies.Synopsis: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed LAPD detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter.

Comedies.Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Comedies.Synopsis: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

Comedies.Title: Crazy Rich Asians
Comedies.Synopsis: This contemporary romantic comedy follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

Comedies.Title: Free Guy
Comedies.Synopsis: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

Comedies.Title: Game Night
Comedies.Synopsis: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery.

Comedies.Title: Knives Out
Comedies.Synopsis: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

Comedies.Title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
Comedies.Synopsis: Famed Southern detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery involving a tech billionaire and his eclectic crew of friends.

Comedies.Title: The Nice Guys
Comedies.Synopsis: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the death of a porn star.

Comedies.Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Comedies.Synopsis: A thief who's auditioning to be an actor gets his biggest role when he's dropped into a murder case with a detective.

Comedies.Title: Midnight Run
Comedies.Synopsis: An ex-cop turned bounty hunter snatches a mob accountant that the FBI wants to use as a key witness. Problem is, the mobster whose scummy deeds will be revealed by the accountant's testimony has put a price on the accountant's head.

Comedies.Title: Analyze This
Comedies.Synopsis: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

Comedies.Title: Midnight in Paris
Comedies.Synopsis: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

Comedies.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Comedies.Synopsis: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Comedies.Title: Little Miss Sunshine
Comedies.Synopsis: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Comedies.Title: The Way Way Back
Comedies.Synopsis: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unlikely mentor in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

Comedies.Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Comedies.Synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Comedies.Title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Comedies.Synopsis: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

Comedies.Title: The World's End
Comedies.Synopsis: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from twenty years earlier unwittingly become humanity's only hope for survival.

Comedies.Title: Baby Driver
Comedies.Synopsis: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself participating in a heist doomed to fail.

Comedies.Title: Central Intelligence
Comedies.Synopsis: After he reunites with an old pal through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

Comedies.Title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Comedies.Synopsis: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

Comedies.Title: Moana
Comedies.Synopsis: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

Comedies.Title: Lilo & Stitch
Comedies.Synopsis: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

Comedies.Title: The Emperor's New Groove
Comedies.Synopsis: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

Comedies.Title: Hercules
Comedies.Synopsis: The son of Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

Comedies.Title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
Comedies.Synopsis: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

Comedies.Title: Soul
Comedies.Synopsis: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul learning about herself.

Comedies.Title: Klaus
Comedies.Synopsis: A selfish postman and a reclusive toymaker form an unlikely friendship, delivering joy to a cold, dark town that desperately needs it.

Comedies.Title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
Comedies.Synopsis: Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

Comedies.Title: Palm Springs
Comedies.Synopsis: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

Comedies.Title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
Comedies.Synopsis: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a bust, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

Comedies.Title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine: The Movie
Comedies.Synopsis: Jake Peralta, an immature but talented NYPD detective in Brooklyn's 99th Precinct, comes into conflict with his new commanding officer.

Comedies.Title: Chef
Comedies.Synopsis: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

Comedies.Title: The Death of Stalin
Comedies.Synopsis: Moscow, 1953. When tyrannical dictator Stalin drops dead, his cronies square off in a darkly comedic power struggle.

Comedies.Title: Paddington
Comedies.Synopsis: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family.

Comedies.Title: Paddington 2
Comedies.Synopsis: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy, only to see it stolen.

Comedies.Title: Yesterday
Comedies.Synopsis: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate timeline where they never existed.

Comedies.Title: Sing Street
Comedies.Synopsis: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

Comedies.Title: Booksmart
Comedies.Synopsis: On the eve of their high school graduation, two academic superstars and best friends realize they should have worked less and played more.

Comedies.Title: The Edge of Seventeen
Comedies.Synopsis: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

Comedies.Title: Easy A
Comedies.Synopsis: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

Comedies.Title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
Comedies.Synopsis: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a suave bachelor.

Comedies.Title: The Proposal
Comedies.Synopsis: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

Comedies.Title: Miss Congeniality
Comedies.Synopsis: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

Comedies.Title: Legally Blonde
Comedies.Synopsis: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While there, she figures out there is more to her than just looks.

Comedies.Title: 10 Things I Hate About You
Comedies.Synopsis: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

Comedies.Title: Clueless
Comedies.Synopsis: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking order.

Comedies.Title: Mean Girls
Comedies.Synopsis: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school. But everything changes when she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels.

Comedies.Title: Pitch Perfect
Comedies.Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group.

Comedies.Title: School of Rock
Comedies.Synopsis: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

Comedies.Title: High Fidelity
Comedies.Synopsis: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Comedies.Title: Say Anything...
Comedies.Synopsis: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

Comedies.Title: Almost Famous
Comedies.Synopsis: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

Comedies.Title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
Comedies.Synopsis: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaii vacation in order to deal with the recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know, Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex.

Comedies.Title: Get Him to the Greek
Comedies.Synopsis: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

Comedies.Title: Role Models
Comedies.Synopsis: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

Comedies.Title: Wet Hot American Summer
Comedies.Synopsis: A comedy set in the fictional Camp Firewood in 1981, as staffers welcome the new camp season on the last day of summer.

Comedies.Title: They Came Together
Comedies.Synopsis: A man and woman tell their mutual friends about how they met and fell in love.

Comedies.Title: I Love You, Man
Comedies.Synopsis: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding.

Comedies.Title: Wanderlust
Comedies.Synopsis: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple survey their options and settle on a commune.

Comedies.Title: Our Idiot Brother
Comedies.Synopsis: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

Comedies.Title: The Other Guys
Comedies.Synopsis: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

Comedies.Title: Ted
Comedies.Synopsis: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted, or his girlfriend.

Comedies.Title: We're the Millers
Comedies.Synopsis: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

Comedies.Title: Horrible Bosses
Comedies.Synopsis: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

Comedies.Title: Identity Thief
Comedies.Synopsis: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Miami to confront the woman who has been using his identity to live it up.

Comedies.Title: The Heat
Comedies.Synopsis: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

Comedies.Title: Spy
Comedies.Synopsis: A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer.

Comedies.Title: Ghostbusters
Comedies.Synopsis: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates attempt to save the world.

Comedies.Title: Central Station
Comedies.Synopsis: An emotive journey of a former schoolteacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

Comedies.Title: Barbie
Comedies.Synopsis: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

Comedies.Title: Lady Bird
Comedies.Synopsis: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

Comedies.Title: Frances Ha
Comedies.Synopsis: A New York woman struggles to make it as a dancer while living in the city but refuses to give up, as she slowly ages out of her passion.

Comedies.Title: Mistress America
Comedies.Synopsis: A lonely college freshman's life is upended by her soon-to-be stepsister.

Comedies.Title: While You Were Sleeping
Comedies.Synopsis: A lonely Chicago transit worker saves the life of a handsome commuter and is mistakenly assumed to be his fiancée.

Comedies.Title: Pretty Woman
Comedies.Synopsis: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

Comedies.Title: Notting Hill
Comedies.Synopsis: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

Comedies.Title: Love Actually
Comedies.Synopsis: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Comedies.Title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
Comedies.Synopsis: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the possibility that he may have discovered love.

Comedies.Title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Comedies.Synopsis: A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

Comedies.Title: About a Boy
Comedies.Synopsis: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

Comedies.Title: The Full Monty
Comedies.Synopsis: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go 'the full monty'.

Comedies.Title: Billy Elliot
Comedies.Synopsis: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

Comedies.Title: The History Boys
Comedies.Synopsis: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric masters as they prepare for entrance exams to Oxford and Cambridge.

Comedies.Title: Pride
Comedies.Synopsis: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

Comedies.Title: Withnail & I
Comedies.Synopsis: In 1969, two out-of-work actors share a flat in Camden Town.

Comedies.Title: A Fish Called Wanda
Comedies.Synopsis: In London, four very different American and British con artists plan to steal a collection of diamonds, and later try to double-cross each other for the loot.

Comedies.Title: Fargo
Comedies.Synopsis: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistence of the very pregnant local police chief Marge Gunderson.

Comedies.Title: Burn After Reading
Comedies.Synopsis: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Comedies.Title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
Comedies.Synopsis: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Comedies.Title: Raising Arizona
Comedies.Synopsis: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

Comedies.Title: Hail, Caesar!
Comedies.Synopsis: A Hollywood fixer in the 1950s works to keep the studio's stars in line.

Comedies.Title: Silver Linings Playbook
Comedies.Synopsis: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany.

Comedies.Title: American Hustle
Comedies.Synopsis: A con man, along with his seductive partner, is forced to work for a wild FBI agent, who pushes them into a world of Jersey power brokers and the Mafia.

Comedies.Title: Joy
Comedies.Synopsis: Joy is the story of a family across four generations centered on the girl who becomes the woman who founds a business dynasty and target several problems facing women.

Comedies.Title: Trainwreck
Comedies.Synopsis: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

Comedies.Title: Blockers
Comedies.Synopsis: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

Comedies.Title: Long Shot
Comedies.Synopsis: When Fred Flarsky reunites with and charms his first crush, Charlotte Field, a beautiful, powerful, and down-to-earth woman who also happens to be the U.S. Secretary of State, the two begin an unlikely courtship.

Comedies.Title: Good Boys
Comedies.Synopsis: Three sixth grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying a bag full of goodies.

Comedies.Title: Tag
Comedies.Synopsis: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

Comedies.Title: Instant Family
Comedies.Synopsis: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children.

Comedies.Title: Daddy's Home
Comedies.Synopsis: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and consider him their father. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

Comedies.Title: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
Comedies.Synopsis: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.

Comedies.Title: Don't Look Up
Comedies.Synopsis: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn humankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

Comedies.Title: The Banshees of Inisherin
Comedies.Synopsis: Set on a remote island off the coast of Ireland, two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship.
